瓜.definition: melon; gourd; squash; (slang) a piece of gossip

瓜代.definition: a changeover of personnel; a new shift; (lit.) replacement for soldier on leave for the melon-picking season

瓜子.definition: melon seed; seeds of pumpkin, watermelon or sunflower etc, roasted and flavored, consumed as a snack

瓜州.definition: Guazhou county in Jiuquan 酒泉, Gansu

瓜州縣.definition: Guazhou county in Jiuquan 酒泉[Jiu3 quan2], Gansu

瓜拉丁加奴.definition: Kuala Terengganu, capital of Terengganu state, Malaysia

瓜無滾圓，人無十全.pinyin: gua1 wu2 gun3 yuan2 , ren2 wu2 shi2 quan2
瓜無滾圓，人無十全.definition: no gourd is perfectly round, just as no man is perfect (proverb)

瓜熟蒂落.definition: when the melon is ripe, it falls (idiom); problems sort themselves out in the fullness of time

瓜田不納履，李下不整冠.pinyin: gua1 tian2 bu4 na4 lu:3 , li3 xia4 bu4 zheng3 guan1
瓜田不納履，李下不整冠.definition: lit. don't tie your shoelaces in a melon patch, and don't adjust your hat under a plum tree (idiom); fig. don't do anything that might arouse suspicion; innocent acts may be misconstrued

瓜田李下.definition: abbr. for 瓜田不納履，李下不整冠|瓜田不纳履，李下不整冠[gua1 tian2 bu4 na4 lu:3 , li3 xia4 bu4 zheng3 guan1]

瓜皮帽.definition: Chinese skullcap resembling the skin of half a watermelon

瓜蒂.definition: pedicel and calyx of muskmelon (used in TCM)

瓜達拉馬.definition: Sierra de Guadarrama (mountain range across Iberia, passing north of Madrid)

瓜達拉馬山.definition: Sierra de Guadarrama (mountain range across Iberia, passing north of Madrid)

瓜達爾.definition: Gwadar, free trade port city in Pakistani province of Baluchistan

瓜達爾卡納爾島.pinyin: Gua1 da2 er3 ka3 na4 er3 Dao3
瓜達爾卡納爾島.definition: Guadalcanal, the largest island in Solomon Islands

瓜達爾卡納爾島戰役.pinyin: Gua1 da2 er3 ka3 na4 er3 Dao3 Zhan4 yi4
瓜達爾卡納爾島戰役.definition: Battle of Guadalcanal (August 1942 - February 1943), a pivotal campaign in the Pacific Theater of World War II

瓜達爾港.definition: Gwadar Port on Arabian Sea in Pakistani province of Baluchistan
